taskbody.prereq: The following steps assume that you have the model open in the editor.

step.cmd: Scroll down the left list of application fields or enter in the Application fields filter the field(s) name you want to add (the wildcard character is the "*").
step.stepresult: List of fields is reduced to matching fields.

step.stepresult: Selected field(s) is moved to the Selected Fields list on the right side. The field is already added to the model.

step.cmd: Select the field in the Selected fields list on the right. Properties displayed on the right belong to this selected field.
step.info: Do not forget to prefix Translation label by a "#" to have it displayed in the browser.

step.cmd: You can use Up and Down buttons to order the fields.

taskbody.result: Selected field(s) are added to the model.
